# /etc/sudoers - Configuration with security issues

# Missing env_reset - environment not sanitized (issue)
# Defaults   env_reset
Defaults   mail_badpass

# Missing secure_path - PATH not restricted (issue)
# Defaults   secure_path=...

# Negative timestamp means creds never expire (issue)
Defaults   timestamp_timeout=-1

# Allows non-interactive sudo (potential issue)
Defaults   !requiretty

# User privilege specification
root    ALL=(ALL:ALL) ALL

# NOPASSWD with ALL commands - critical security issue
deploy  ALL=(ALL) NOPASSWD: ALL

# NOPASSWD for specific user - warning
backup  ALL=(root) NOPASSWD: /usr/bin/rsync, /usr/bin/tar

# SETENV allows environment override - potential risk
developer ALL=(ALL) SETENV: ALL

# ALL commands without NOPASSWD - warning
operator ALL=(ALL) ALL

#includedir /etc/sudoers.d
